name: lust hostel
description:
Full view
You will be able to control a camera turning, rotating, zooming and moving around the environment in which the action takes place, to enjoy the erotic scenes that the game offers.


Dialogs
Interact with the characters to learn the history of all the hostel guests. This will allow you to progress through the story and progress through the content of the game.


Interactive
Explore the environment to get the necessary tools to advance in the story.
